entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 2:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: E 16 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
